website_summaries.verdict: The laid-back Keds Chillax sneaker perfectly embraces the go-to silhouette for relaxing and hanging out with its all-around comfort and convenient slip-on function. Its laceless look goes well with almost any outfit and its fabric is soft enough to be breathable yet would revert to its original form.The toe part of the upper would tend to tear a hole because of the soft nature of the material. Stress builds upon that area, and preventive measures are futile, so it’s best to buy more pairs to alternate its daily use.
pros: Though there are inconsistencies regarding the sneaker's construction, a vast majority of the reviewers have encountered a true to size fit
The sneaker boasts a right amount of comfort and can even maintain its coziness after walking for long hours
Several of them treat the sneaker as everyday wear
The sneaker brilliantly makes any outfit pop and goes well with virtually any article of clothing
The easy slip-on feature is superb which makes it a convenient go-to sneaker
According to some users, the no-lace look would coincide with almost everything
Many had bought more than two pairs of it in different colorways
Others are also planning to buy all available colors just so that they would not go empty-handed if the sneaker wears out
The soft fabric has more flex as compared to canvas Keds shoes and it allows the sneaker to revert to its original form
Some loved that it is breathable
It is a sneaker that is perfect for spring or summer.One reviewer stated that the sneaker is ideal for the concurrent Texas summer where sandals are not practical for the terrain
The sneaker can be easily cleaned just by throwing it into the washer
Traveling with it is ideal because of its light weight and high function
cons: Wearing the Keds Chillax without socks would sometimes cause blisters due to the frequent rubbing of the back collar
A lot of customers were appalled about the shoddy construction of the toe which after some light usage would produce holes
A handful of wearers noticed that the toe box is a little bit flimsy and lacks structure

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are so comfortable. I like the color too
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are so comfortable. I like the color too. They go with a lot casual clothes. The only warning is that they are narrow and you need to order a size up if your feet are wide. My feet are narrow, but still feel pretty tight. The length is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The keds are bomb
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I expected. They fit great with our without a sock on and the fabric is worn and soft but still holds up to daily wear. I purchased these after another style of keds I liked stopped being made. I love these more! Also, the sole/insert comes out so you can easily wash them. The insert is kind of a water resistant foam insert that I usually just hand wash in the sink while I toss the rest of the shoe in the washer. I usually dry them on low heat and the fabric doesn't seem shrunk or tight after doing so. They're true to size and I definitely recommend these to anyone who loves comfy keds!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and fit. What an extreme disappointment and I am out $30.
customer_reviews.text: I was very, very x1000 disappointed in these shoes and can’t believe all the great reviews they got. No way are they ever worth the $30 I paid for them. I ordered my regular size and the shoes are very tight and narrow. The material is so cheap, worse than you’d even get at a dollar store. In no way are they anything like the Keds I remembered growing up that lasted all summer. Keds should be ashamed of themselves,best for selling this trash.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: I will be buying more colors!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing. They’re very comfortable and go with almost everything. The first time you wear them they seem a little snug and narrow. However, they do loosen up. There’s no need to break them in. They fit like a glove and feel amazing on your feet. I will absolutely be buying in more colors! I like the look of these a little better than TOMS. I would not suggest wearing these with socks, but if you do I would wear the thinner no show socks. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I really like these pairs of Keds. They look super cute and are comfy. I would have given 5 stars but my only complaint is the crease at top of sneaker. They are distinct and noticeable but tolerable for me. I will research how to take out creases from sneakers and hopefully I can take them out. But overall, I am happy with them and are just what I wanted for slip on sneakers. I am a 7.5 in women and I ordered an 8 just to be sure they fit and I’m glad I did. They fit perfect with liner socks on also.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Definitely order up at least a half size, cutest shoes ever.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 pairs of the discontinued Chillax Chukka sneakers in the same charcoal color and one pair of these low top Chillax sneakers in the all black. The 7.5 fits me perfect in the Chukkas but these low tops definitely run small. I ordered the all black in a 7.5 and they're quite snug, I rarely wear them. I ordered these in an 8 and they fit much better. They are very narrow still, if it weren't for the length I would have gone up a full size. I love love love the Chillax line of Keds. They're comfortable and ridiculously cute with all kinds of outfits. I wear them with jeans, shorts, dresses, everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best comfort meets style everyday shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I own these shoes in every color. They are my go to comfy shoes. They look great with every outfit and the inserts are so soft, like your walking on a cloud. The leopard print is a superior print and doesn’t look super fake like some prints. The shoes are already broken in so there’s no weird stiffness/break in period. No laces looks clean and is easy to slip on. I wouldn’t buy if you have wide feet as they are slender but other than that they are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: H.K

customer_reviews.title: The toe box is a bit too pointy, but comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I have other Keds sneaks, they are a reliably made brand. These slip-on are very comfortable. I didn't need any break-in period at all. That said, seems this particular shoe has a bit of a pointier toe than my other pairs of Keds sneakers, which causes a bit of a wrinkle in the front of the shoe. I am not going to return them, but if I had tried them on in a store, I likely would not have purchased them. I do have a wider, square toed foot.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Slightly more narrow than regular Keds
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size 6 because that’s the size of my other baseball Keds. These are a bit more narrow. The material is more relaxed so I sprayed them with warm water and wore them for a day, they fit much better now. I read a lot of reviews with holes in the toes after a month of wear. so I put a piece of duct tape inside the shoe under the toe part to prevent any holes from forming. But they are cute and simple. Really I needed to get a 6.5 but I made them work.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Way overpriced. Very narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I’m pregnant and wanted a comfy pair of slip on shoes since it’s getting harder to tie my shoelaces! I bought a size up like others were saying to do if you have wider feet. Do not buy these if you have wide feet. I don’t even think my feet are THAT wide but these are definitely made for petite teens or people with extremely narrow feet. Definitely not worth the price. I wish I could get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Fits Weird
customer_reviews.text: So I have had keds since I was probably like 6. I have never bought the slip-on style like these but I figured i would branch out. The toe area in these shoes just looks weird. Like the didn't stretch the material enough so it has ripples all through them. Honestly, they make me too self-conscious to wear anywhere that people would see them. I will probably never order keds online again in fear that that is where all of the malformed shoes are sold.
customer_reviews.author: Juni

customer_reviews.title: Great--and washable!! No more smelly flats
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They are cute with skirts or pants, dainty silhouette. The only problem is that the elastic that attaches the tonge and the sides makes a lump (not visible) but it puts pressure on my foot. I'm hoping it will loosen up a bit. Update: increased to five stars--the elastic no longer puts an pressure on my foot, I have washed the shoes several times and have had no problems with them. These are the best shoes ever. Way better than smelly old ballet flats and look good with pretty much all the same outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Love! So cute! They're a little snug around the bridge because of the elastic so if you plan to wear socks, definitely go up a half size. I just got them today so can't say anything about how they wear and tear. However, just wearing them around the house, I can tell they'll be comfy, especially once broken in. They have some arch support which is always a plus! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes for vacation!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a trip to Europe. I have flat feet and these are tight with socks so I wore them without socks. Next size up was too large even with socks. Let me tell you..these are amazing! I walked 10+ miles in a day on my second trip with these and I could keep going! No blisters or tired feet. Love love love and will buy in more colors for vacation! They do get smelly without socks so will be washing the insoles often.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Quite literally the worst shoes I've EVER owned. :(
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get these shoes as I'm a Keds fan and thought these shoes were so cute. As soon as I put them on, however they were tight. I figured it would take time to wear them in properly but before that could happen the tongue of the shoes rubbed a blister on the top of my foot. I also noticed that it has ZERO cushioning providing NO support whatsoever. I have never been more disappointed in a shoe. DO NOT BUY THESE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hall

customer_reviews.title: Fit and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Have I written a review about these shoes yet? I must. They are so comfortable. I always look forward to when I can wear them. I purchased the tan ones. Love the color, as it is so versatile. They are a cute casual shoe to wear with jeans and leggings. I ordered my normal size, 6.5, and they fit perfectly. I will be ordering another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pahlau

customer_reviews.title: So comfy & light!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Wore them on a trip to Europe walking around cobble stone roads and miles and miles a day, and not once were my feet sore! They’re so cute and light but offer great comfort. They were a little bigger than I hoped but I wore them with socks and then they fit fine! They don’t hold shape well because they are just cloth, so keep that in mind. Maybe storing them with the a stuffer would help!
customer_reviews.author: TheRealDeal

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes. The problem is with sizing. I wear a 10 in Keds. Currently have 3 pair. However, this style is very undersized. A size 10 is more like a size 9 (gave these to someone that could wear a 9). I ordered the 11. Assumed it would fit like a 10. No, it was too big. Thought maybe the first size 10 was mislabeled. Ordered a different color and size 10. Way too small again. Plus the shoe box was heavily water/liquid damaged. Shoes had been wet. The outer Amazon box was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super narrow shoe :(
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very cute. However, as some of the other reviewers stated, if you have even a slightly wide foot these shoes are not for you. The toe gets extremely narrow. Length wise these shoes fit great but my feet looked crammed in these shoes and my toes didn't reach the tip of the shoe bc it was so narrow. Sad to send these back!
customer_reviews.author: Captbs32

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent sizing, drizzle gray is fine.
customer_reviews.text: The Chillax in the drizzle gray is true to size, and fairly comfortable - although the footbeds are a little scratchy and I'd prefer they weren't. I have very average-width feet, and these are just acceptable in width, leaning toward too-tight in the midfoot area. I could not wear more than a thin sock liner with these for that reason. They aren't the first pair of casuals I'd reach for, by any means, but they're decent. The cream color (off-white on the box), is a different story, and I returned them. I bought the same size, my normal in this type, 8.5, as the drizzle gray, but the cream is way too long in the toe, and totally unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: madeinCarolinas

customer_reviews.title: Love my Keds!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, slip on shoes. These look great, are comfortable and fit as expected. I am flat-footed so the lack of a high arch in the sole is desirable for me. These shoes are stylish and I kick them on for everything from yoga, running errands and even traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not new condition
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very cute but these were delivered with a small almost hole already on the right shoe in the toe area and the tag was detached and stuffed inside the shoe. There were also faded white areas on both shoes like something had been spilled on them. It looks like someone had already worn these and returned them before they were sent to me. Bummer. I returned them & am ordering another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Colors Not Accurate, Size is Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I anxiously waited for my order to arrive. What a disappointment. First, there is nothing "washed" about the pair I received. They are a very dark navy color. The length if okay, but the "medium" width is not a true medium. Very snug fitting. Disappointed as I have ordered many Keds shoes and was always very pleased. Not this time. I was going to order another pair once I received these to see how the fit was. I just deleted the item from my cart. Debating about sending them back or just use them for yard work shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Dot K.

customer_reviews.title: My go to sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: I order these sneakers twice a year as they are a staple in my wardrobe. They go with everything, are adorable, plus... NO LACES! They are also easy to wash which gives me a whole other 6 months out of them before I order a new pair for a fresh clean look. They definitely are on the narrow side though so if you have wide feet they might be a bit snug.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Favorite all day shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These are my 2nd pair as I hate laces. Bought my first pair on sale so was so happy to see them on Amazon. A bit pricy but love, love, love them. I wear without socks ( suggest you use Odor eaters) and have spent a full day walking at a fair. No blisters, no foot pain. When these are done I will buy another pair. Wish they were just a bit less pricy.
customer_reviews.author: Oh Suzanna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slipon
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cute slipon for the beach besides the requisite flip flops. I’ve had the regular keds slipons and liked them but could not find the color I wanted. These are perfect. So comfortable and easy to slip right in for a quick trip to town.
customer_reviews.author: Jjarman

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: I live in this shoe. Buy your exact size. This shoe is so comfortable, great for dressing down but also cute for a comfy casual look with nice pants or even a dress. They are so comfortable, easily washable. I like the removable footbed for the most part since you can take it out and wash it and the rest of the shoe so easily. I just wish it came in more colors!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable to me. I have wider feet and these do fit a little snug, but I tend to like that. They seemed to stretch and form to my feet anyways. Very happy with this purchase. I ended up buying more Keds from their website.
customer_reviews.author: Lukesolo

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Keds are my favorite! However, these are my favorite keds! They are so comfy and I love that you can slide them on and go. My husband asked why they didn't come with shoe strings 🙄. I think they are perfect! I love that they are a crisp white (hopefully I can keep them that way). You won't go wrong if you order these.
customer_reviews.author: candace

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are very unattractive but I can't seem to find the same style with the shorter tongue length. That shoe is also called Chillax something or other but they are nowhere to be found. Come on Keds, these shoes are hideous but I needed a pair of slip on Keds so I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: SherylB

customer_reviews.title: More stylish than laced keds!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these a few times because I wear them so often. My foots a little wide and it still takes no time at all to break them in. I get so many compliments which is awesome since they are my comfiest shoes. The outside edge on my latest pair is pulling up where it meets the sole but that's my only problem. I love how you can wipe the soles clean, since they are a rubber matetial.
customer_reviews.author: Emily R

customer_reviews.title: Runs SMALL, but nice sneaks
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice but run very small! I’m a size 6 ordered a 6.5 too small, returned them and re-ordered a 7...still tight...I can wear them but not comfortably. Wish I ordered an 8 probably would have been perfect fit but I’ll never know
customer_reviews.author: Becky D

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable and cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these Keds! They are soft and already "broken in", they have a clean look to them and aren't as "heavy" looking as most tennis shoes on the market today. I wear them with jeans, shorts, and skirts (normally I wouldn't wear anything like this with a skirt but they are low profile and cute). I recently went to europe and wore them all day, every day for touring around (we walked miles and miles) and they were so comfortable! I don't need a ton of support so keep that in mind with this review. Over all, I highly recommend them (so much so, that i have bought 2 other colors!)
customer_reviews.author: Legare

customer_reviews.title: Love these Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes! This is actually my second pair. They go with everything and are very comfortable from the moment you put them on. They don't have the most support on them, but I'm expecting that you aren't going to be going on a jog in these. I bought my second pair for a trip to Europe and they were ready to go right away and I didn't even need to wear them in. No blisters and no issues. I think they go so well with so many different options - a cute, casual dress, jeans, romper - you name it. They look great.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie-Kate

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Usually wear a 10 in Keds but I can wear and prefer a 9 1/2 in this style. This is my favorite style that Keds makes and I wish they would make them in every color because I own all the basic colors they currently produce. However they do tend to run a little large. I have a long skinny foot and I still have to go down a size.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers and have purchased several pairs and colors. While the arch support is good, I would not rate it great. I have high arches and don't need a strong support so I can wear these comfortably all day and even on long walks. They wash up easily in the washer and look like new. I love the no laces look too! Follow-up to say that with socks, they are too tight for me. But with the little sock liners that are thinner, they are fine. They are my favorite shoes! I will be sorry when the snow flies as I will have to wear heavier shoes because these can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Burch

customer_reviews.title: Cute, fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: These are cute. I love the white ones and I bought these in hope they'd be a better choice for playground time with my kids as the white ones dirty easily. I was right. They hold up well with no looking dirty so fast and they are a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the purchase although I don’t think they’ll last long because the fabric is thin. The crinkle of the fabric at the toes is a minor annoyance but overall they’re cute! Snug fit that’s true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite shoes. Classic white, easy slip ons. I replace them once or twice a year. I throw away the insole that comes with the shoe. They're terrible. I have a yellow insole that i bought off amazon for $7 and they are great. I've had the same insoles for 3 years and switch them in to my new keds.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney H.

customer_reviews.title: So cute but SO narrow
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I needed new white tennies and my best friend has worn this style for years. I will probably keep them, but I’m really disappointed in how narrow they are. They’re canvas, so I’m hoping a shoe stretcher will help, but even the sole feels narrow. Keds used to have such a great range of wide width shoes, so disappointing that they don’t anymore.
customer_reviews.author: cassiet717

customer_reviews.title: Cute, pretty comfy, and you can throw them in the wash!
customer_reviews.text: Anytime I buy a pair of slip-ons, I know I'm not going to get a perfectly arch supportive tennis shoe. But these are quite comfortable and I wear them often. They're really cute and easy to slip on and off. And the best part is that their insoles come out and you can throw them in the washing machine. I usually rinse the bottoms off in the sink, remove the insoles (sometimes I throw those in too), toss them in with some oxyclean and they're as good as new. White shoes get dirty so quickly, it was important to me that I could manage this. Always air dry!
customer_reviews.author: ematteso

customer_reviews.title: ot like.
customer_reviews.text: I have two pair of cans of different style than this and I love them this is the second time I’ve tried these kids into different sizes I really wanted them There’s so much room at the top of the show that it makes them uncomfortable be comfortable but There’s so much room at the top of the show that it makes them uncomfortable.Searching for a keg should like this but maybe a different style I really want kids without shoelaces any suggestions
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am giving these 3 stars only because I like the color. The left shoe tongue keeps bunching up on the top of my foot which starts to hurt after 5 min so I constantly have to adjust them. On top of that the holes on the shoe look so cheap with the stitching because the holes are way smaller than where the stitching is so you can see the fabric on the outter part of the hole then the stitching making them look super cheap. Will Not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: eliza

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of the Keds laceless slip ons. They are my favorite shoes because they're soooo comfortable. I love how they are flexible, so easy to put on, and the fabric is soft. They also look very flattering. I wish they came in more colors!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunnie

customer_reviews.title: Narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought 8.5 because the 8 was so narrow they were too tight. This pair was really too big but still wearable. The heel is a bit loose and the toe part wrinkles up. Not great considering the cost. I guess Keds just aren't the right fit for me. Had no problems with Amazon on this order. This is strictly a Keds design issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They do run a little big so if you're going to wear without socks you might consider sizing down. Or if you're going to switch inserts to something more significant that would help take extra space up, maybe not. I myself need arch support so I switch them out. Very satisfied overall with the look and feel. Might order more. **I'd love it if Keds would make the lace holes dark grey on the black shoes so they aren't straight black. I'd like some black ones but not totally one color.

customer_reviews.title: Check order immediately upon receiving.
customer_reviews.text: Fits tight at the arch. I was out of town and when returned tried them but too tight. Hurts my arch. Was out of town again to help watch my young grandchild and when returned it was too late to return them. Guess they will be great for the donation box. They are cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Turner

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow and runs 1/2-1 size small.
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving it a 3 because although they were way too tight, narrow, and the sizing was small, the soles did seem like they’d be comfortable and I liked the color (ordered both the gray and solid black) and price. They offer these shoes on the American Eagle website for double the price! So disappointed I must return them. I would not recommend these shoes for anyone on the regular width line and if you do have a more narrow foot, I would recommend AT LEAST a half size bigger than your normal size if not even a whole size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Awful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a pair of keds fall apart like these have!! I've had them obly 3 months and don't even wear them regularly and the entire side of my right shoe has ripped away from the sole!!! Completely useless now and the keds I've had for years now are still going strong. The material on these is thin and clearly tears easily. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Very comfortable to slip on and work outside. I would go up a half size or a whole size. They are tight. Usually with cloth shoes they stretch out but these haven’t.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Latiolais

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: I am a Keds fan for a long time I find them comfortable and current with their styles if shoe is a little large just add a insert you can pick one up for about a dollar
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Run very large, and with pointy toes
customer_reviews.text: These are comfy walking and house shoes, but I was disappointed at how large and pointy they are. I expected the toe box to be more rounded. I usually wear an 8.5, these shoes are at least a full size too big. Edit/Update: I bought these in September of 2017, and as of March 2018, they have holes torn in the side from normal every day use. For the price, I really expected them to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: J-Taps

customer_reviews.title: After 5 weeks, developed a hole in toe
customer_reviews.text: Even those these shoes fit properly, they developed a hole in the toe after 5 weeks. I have asked for my money back or a return shoe. I will let you know if seller responds.
customer_reviews.author: Dhyan Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoes and they will work wonderfully for walking around Key West! Very comfortable. Easy on and off. I typically wear a 6.5, sometimes a 7. I read the reviews and ordered a 6.5. My toe just reaches the top of the shoe. I probably could have gone with a 7... My foot tends to be a little wide (I don't wear wide width though) and I had no problem getting them on.
customer_reviews.author: L.W.

customer_reviews.title: Rad shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I normally wear 7.5 - 8 so I got an 8 and length wise they're perfect but maybe I just have fat feet cus they're snug. I had previously bought the olive green ones in an 8.5 and they fit great except they were like an inch too long which looked funny. I love the style and got the tan ones and love the color. If maybe I didn't get chubby after having my new baby my feet would fit perfectly so I'm giving these good stars!
customer_reviews.author: AMF

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair on same keds model, laceless Chillax slip on. I've always loved these. For some reason, the 'navy' color pair I ordered recently are different than the other three. They are missing the reinforced heel and as such I keep slipping out of them. Not sure if these are seconds or what the issue is.
customer_reviews.author: drea

customer_reviews.title: These run a little small
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, but they run almost 1/2 size smaller than Keds' regular size. I returned for the next larger size and will add an innersole if too large. I find that most Keds shoes are a little on the narrow size which is why I buy them as I wear a size 8.5 narrow and Keds usually fit just fine. These shoes are soft and comfy and they have an elastic inset on the tongue which makes them a slip-on while appearing to be a very casual pair of regular tennies without laces. Cute and casual.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Bishop

customer_reviews.title: On my second pair!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Keds Chillax. They are my go to shoes all through the summer. Great with jeans, jean skirt, shorts... They are comfortable: the toe box is roomy enough (a problem area for me); there is no slippage in the heel; they break in the right place. I can wear these straight out of the box. No doubt there will be other pairs of these in my future.
customer_reviews.author: Ckeh

customer_reviews.title: I really really wanted to love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really really wanted to love these shoes. I was super excited to about them arriving, I was surprised that they arrived on a sunday which isn't a normal thing. They would have been perfect and I would have given them five stars however they were too narrow. I tried putting them on and they went on with a lot of effort and were super tight on my feet. They wont go to waste as I have two younger college aged sisters who would love these shoes so its not a complete waste of money. They are worth buying just beware of sizing I would order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are cute and comfortable. However, they're very poor quality. I have had them for one month and they already have holes in them. I stick my toes up so most of my shoes end up with holes in the top of them by the end of their life, but I have NEVER had this happen so quickly in a pair of shoes. I have had other Keds before and loved them. They've always been high quality. These, however, are not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I do love these shoes. They run large...I normally wear 8.5 and have a med-wide width. I ordered an 8 and they are perfect. Have worn them all day and they feel like slippers...very comfortable. Do not have much arch support which is fine because I don't have a high arch. Easy to slip on/off. Will order in another color.
customer_reviews.author: LAB

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! I got a size 10 which is my usual size and they fit perfectly. Only thing is after wearing them a while they stretched out a bit, but I threw them in the wash and then dryer and they shrunk up back to their perfect shape. Must buy.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, but NOT FOR WIDE FEET!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes came in perfect condition. Not at ALL for wide feet. Length seems true to size, but the they are VERY narrow. I wear them anyway (with kind of wide feet) but they just look a little warped or stretched in some places.
customer_reviews.author: Town

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: For the price I think they are pretty well made. They have light support, are a good fit, and look cute! They are on the snug side and I have kinda narrow feet, but I'm guessing will probably relax with wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazongirl777

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like that these shoes come in different colors. Mix and match with your favorite T's. Slender and feminine look. I wish there were more colors available.
customer_reviews.author: DIana

customer_reviews.title: Get them now
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear US9 or sometimes 8.5 and I decided to get 9. I don’t have wide feet and they fit perfectly. I would say it’s narrow, so if you have wide feet, you should get half size up. I love them !! It’s very conformable and won’t make your feet look big and wide
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Don't fit had to exchange for a different size
customer_reviews.text: So I received my shoes a little disappointed I got a size 6 because the shoes are narrow so I thought I would need to go to a 6 because I have wider feet. I get them and they are too big so I have to now return for a smaller size. Other than that being annoying I did seek to like them if they fit my feet.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Keds Women's Chillax Laceless
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend this model : no any support for foot at all. Back soft and not stable It is not even cloth to origional champion sleep- one’s
customer_reviews.author: Oksana

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: First off, I don't know how people say this shoe runs big. I am a true 7-1/2 in every shoe I wear (besides running shoes that normally run small). This shoe is short. My toes are at the very end. They're very cute and comfortable, but small. I'm keeping them only bc I wanted them for the weekend and it's too late to return and get another pair. My advice, order half size up and you'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reaux

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfy....you will not be disappointed! They felt a little snug at first but after one wear they stretched out just enough so order the size that you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: SNAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Tight seam across top of foot, not exactly a slip-on for people with higher arches.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something easy to slip on, as I'm 9 months pregnant and reaching my feet isn't an easy task right now. However, the shoes are really tight across the top of my foot, to the point of being slightly uncomfortable to walk in as well. Length is fine, width is fine. I do have high arches (even this late in pregnancy!) so if you have flatter feet they might be more comfortable for you.
customer_reviews.author: Snapdragonflie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I'm size 7-7,5 in a closed shoe. So 7,5 fits fine. They are cheap, not a great looking. Not well made either. The wrinkled toe box looks ridiculous, and that is not due to a wrong size. I have a couple more Keds, those are much better quality. Still undecided should I keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Great for slender feet. Wear well. Look good and no blisters!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a narrow heal. She works retail and is on her feet all day. She is on her 3rd pair of white ones and I just ordered her the navy (denim) colored ones. Her absolute favorite sneaker!
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Comfort Of A Slip-On, Style Of A Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9 in Keds, so I ordered a 9. They fit true to size. They’re a little tight around my toes, but Keds are usually narrow. They feel like classic Toms, but they’re styled more like a sneaker. Overall, I really like them, and will order another pair when they go on sale!
customer_reviews.author: Arie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Cute + They go with any outfit!
customer_reviews.text: I like these simple white sneakers. They go easily with any outfit and are super comfortable. They are kinda soft so they get bending marks from walking. I'd recommend to go with a half size under what you normally wear because they are on the longer side of the spectrum.
customer_reviews.author: Magdielis Gregory Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find style...Great for my Europe Vacation!  Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Keds! I wore them all over Europe during my summer vacation this year and they didn't disappoint. Super comfy and looked great with my casual outfits. Plus, this particular style ( white, washed, no strings just eyelets) were impossible to find in my local stores...All sold out in my size. Excellent to find on Amazon and delivered the next day! I just bought another pair for a friend who loved mine during our trip!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sneaker - good quality
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very good quality, fit well, true to size. Very happy with them and would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Rowey

customer_reviews.title: You've got to be Ked-ing me
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear on a trip I went on and they were great. I've gotten several compliments. I put them in the wash and they didn't yellow like other canvas shoes tend to do.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Montes

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these! So comfortable and easy to slip on and go. I have the grey ones too! A must have!
customer_reviews.author: Deenie

customer_reviews.title: Timeless Classics
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with a pair of keds--this is by no means my first or last pair. I really like the laceless slip-on feature of these. They're canvas so it won't be long until they're dirty but they're cute, inexpensive, comfortable, and go with everything. I'm usually a 7.5/8 in sneakers, I bought a 7.5 since I wear these with no socks or thin no-shows; fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: KJC

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Took me a bit to break it in and once it’s broken in it was comfortable. It’s narrow on the top and I’m a petite woman. It had a nice support but it’s not the type of shoes that you can go to Disneyland in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little big on me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in a 7.5, which is my typical shoe size, and they were a bit big on me. I guess a 7 would've fit me better. They don't slip off while I'm walking, but you can tell they're loose. Still comfortable shoes though and very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love These
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several pairs of these because the price is great and I love the product. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa daidone

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes I own
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for almost 2 years and they are my favorite walking shoe. Zero breaking in needed and they practically feel like slippers. With extra insert support I wore these for a 14 hour day at Disney and they were so easy on my very sensitive feet. Go-to travel shoes since they're so light. They go with everything and they make my feet look adorably small. I wish they were as cheap now as they were when I first bought them because I want at least one more color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice try but no cigar.
customer_reviews.text: Boy, did they cheapen up the fabric on these! It looks nice but is too thin and puckers around the top of the toe area. You can't just slip your feet into them anymore because the fabric collapses. They are also running a bit more narrow, too narrow for me. I ordered medium width. I very disappointed and had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny R.

customer_reviews.title: Size 8
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Ked for sixty something years and I still love them. I now order the slip on but still lovin them.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent sizing
customer_reviews.text: I wear keds regularly and know my size. When ordering the first pair received had one shoe that was marked right but was much smaller than the other. They sent a replaced and I shipped back the others, now the new pair both shoes are too big/seemed stretched out.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wanted red and these were more orange than red. I hate them because I can’t wear them with my outfit that I bought them to wear with.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair I ordered. They are comfy and cute with many outfits. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: T Hale

customer_reviews.title: Keds are the best.
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't order shoes online. But Keds fit accurately and I feel confident when ordering that they will fit. These were very comfortable and I wore them for several hours the first day I got them. They're a little snug to put on, but with a shoe horn it was easier to get them on. They fit snugly with no slipping. I like the color too. They look well with black jeans, not faded.
customer_reviews.author: Hallie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: nice looking, but
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to rate these shoes. They looked nice. But they were just too small.
customer_reviews.author: Triffic

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Loved these shoes but had to send them back because they are narrow across the toe bed. Wish they came in a wide.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hedal

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoes, but sizing is way off
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a half size up from my normal shoe size and they’re too small. Can’t even get my foot in them completely because they’re too small which is a shame because I was so excited to get these. I plan on returning and buying a different pair of white slip-ons as I don't want to guess order a different size just to might have to return them again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Eagar

customer_reviews.title: Like the Laceless Look
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes. I bought two pair because I wasn't sure of the size - 7M and 7 1/2M. I kept the 7M. The shoes are well made (they're Keds after all). And I like the laceless look too. I wasn't sure I would. They are snug enough that I don't feel I would want to "lace" them tighter. All in all, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Z.

customer_reviews.title: Love these. This is my 3rd pair
customer_reviews.text: Love these. This is my 3rd pair...same color. I literally wear them constantly all summer until they fall apart and then wear the worn ones to do yard work.. I live on a lake and often in the water. I put them in the washing machine and dryer. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful casual shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes this is my 4th pair, they are comfortable, easy wear and simple.
customer_reviews.author: tamiko Lemonier

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought a white pair and a black pair, first of all they are not half as cute to me as they are in the pictures. They look like nurses shoes; very unflattering (especially the white pair). The white pair is too big, and the black pair is too small.
customer_reviews.author: travis kruso

customer_reviews.title: love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Ked's kid since forever and well into adulthood I'm still loving this company and these shoes! I got these in an 8.5 and probably could've comfortably gotten a size 8 but no matter! In some companies I wear a size 9! They fit so well and they are incredibly comfortable! Every woman needs two things as part of her fashion staple. 1) a LBD and 2) a pair of small white sneaks :)
customer_reviews.author: shanequa mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but a little tight
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 6 or 6.5 in women’s shoes, but I have had a pair of keds before and it was a 7 so I ordered a 7. They are still a little tight around my toes, they have stretched a little bit since I got them, so I can still wear them, but had I known, I would have ordered the 7.5. They’re really cute though!
customer_reviews.author: B. Mullenberg

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy camper with these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I am returning them because right out of the box, I noticed wrinkled canvas material at the toe area. They looked sloppily made and were very baggy all over. Back they went.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Klyber

product_meta.title: Keds Women's Chillax Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description: So relaxed, so chill, so loved, the Keds Women's Chillax Washed Laceless Slip-On Sneaker brings style and comfort to your new everyday shoe. Sport a cool and relaxed style with this Keds Chillax Sneaker. It's perfect for casual occasions. It has a convenient slip-on style without laces. For a snug fit, it features an interior elastic panel. The rubber outsole of this shoe is textured and flexible. This sneaker has a breathable interior lining which will feel soft against your skin. The cushioned insole adds to the comfort. The removable footbed can be replaced with your personalized orthopedic footbed.
feature_bullets: Slip-on canvas sneaker featuring laceless vamp and small logo tags at tongue and topline
